00020 #include <sys/time.h>
00021 #include <time.h>
00022 #include <fstream>
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 using namespace std;
00025 
00026 #include <rdkcore/posixconstructs/posixmutex.h>
00027 using namespace PosixConstructs;
00028 
00029 #include "profiling.h"
00030 
00031 double cpu_time( void );
00032 
00033 namespace RDK2 { namespace Profiling {
00034 
00035 ofstream ofs;
00036 bool doProfile = false;
00037 
00038 PosixConstructs::PosixMutex mutex;
00039 
00040 clock_t startClock;
00041 struct timeval startTimestamp;
00042 
00043 int getTimestamp()
00044 {
00045     static struct timeval a;
00046     gettimeofday(&a, 0);
00047     a.tv_sec -= startTimestamp.tv_sec;
00048     a.tv_usec -= startTimestamp.tv_usec;
00049     return a.tv_sec * 1000000 + a.tv_usec;
00050 }
00051 
00052 // Returns cpu time in microseconds
00053 int getClock()
00054 {
00055     return (clock() - startClock) * 1000000 / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00056 }
00057 
00058 int getClockBetter()
00059 {
00060     return (int)(cpu_time() * 1000*1000);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void Profiler::open(const char* filename)
00064 {
00065     ofs.open(filename, ios::trunc | ios::out);
00066     doProfile = true;
00067     gettimeofday(&startTimestamp, 0);
00068     startClock = clock();
00069 }
00070 
00071 void Profiler::start(const char* name)
00072 {
00073     addCustomLine("START", name);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void Profiler::end(const char* name)
00077 {
00078     addCustomLine("END", name);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void Profiler::lock(const char* name)
00082 {
00083     addCustomLine("LOCK", name);
00084 }
00085 
00086 void Profiler::unlock(const char* name)
00087 {
00088     addCustomLine("UNLOCK", name);
00089 }
00090 
00091 void Profiler::addCustomLine(const char* what, const char* name, const char* otherInfo)
00092 {
00093     if (!doProfile) return;
00094     mutex.lock(HERE);
00095     ofs << getTimestamp() << " " << getClock() << " " << getClockBetter() << " " << pthread_self() << " ";
00096     ofs << what << " " << name << " " << otherInfo << endl;
00097     mutex.unlock();
00098 }
00099 
00100 }} // namespaces
